original_text: And he lifted up his eyes, and saw the women and the children; and said, Who are those with thee? And he said, The children which God hath graciously given thy servant.
korean_text: 에서가 눈을 들어 여인들과 자식들을 보고 묻되 너와 함께 한 이들은 누구냐 야곱이 이르되 하나님이 주의 종에게 은혜로 주신 자식들이니이다

sentences.original_text: And he lifted up his eyes
and saw the women and the children
and said, Who are those with thee?
sentences.korean_translation: 말하되, 당신과 함께 있는 자들은 누구니?

sentences.original_text: which God hath graciously given thy servant.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 당신의 종에게 은혜로이 주신 자들이니이다.
